H0.text: What is the name of the scientific discipline that deals with the measurement and representation of the Earth, including its gravitational field, in a three-dimensional time-varying space. Geophysics

H1.text: What is the name of the scientific discipline that deals with the measurement and representation of the Earth, including its gravitational field, in a three-dimensional time-varying space. Cartography

H2.text: What is the name of the scientific discipline that deals with the measurement and representation of the Earth, including its gravitational field, in a three-dimensional time-varying space. Geomagnetism

H3.text: What is the name of the scientific discipline that deals with the measurement and representation of the Earth, including its gravitational field, in a three-dimensional time-varying space. Geodosy

A4.text: Geodesy refers to the science of measuring and representing the geometry, gravity, and spatial orientation of the Earth in temporally varying 3D.

A5.text: Geodesy appears in Encyclop√¶dia Britannica, Vol. 11 (11th ed.). 1911.

A7.text: Geophysics () is a subject of natural science concerned with the physical processes and properties of Earth and its surrounding space environment, and the use of quantitative methods for their analysis.

A8.text: Society of Exploration Geophysicists focuses on geophysics.
